type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.CheckstyleReports
type.description: The reporting configuration for the Checkstyle task.

method.name: getXml
method.description:
The checkstyle XML report

This report IS enabled by default.

returns:The checkstyle XML report

method.name: getHtml
method.description:
The checkstyle HTML report.

This report IS enabled by default.

Enabling this report will also cause the XML report to be generated, as the HTML is derived from the XML.

returns:The checkstyle HTML report @since 2.10

property.name: html
property.description:
The checkstyle HTML report.

This report IS enabled by default.

Enabling this report will also cause the XML report to be generated, as the HTML is derived from the XML.

returns:The checkstyle HTML report @since 2.10

property.name: xml
property.description:
The checkstyle XML report

This report IS enabled by default.

returns:The checkstyle XML report
